name: Peep the Trayton
storyline: Immerse yourself in the world of Westminster School of Scooby-Doo with your professor Dr. Trayton. Explore fully original classrooms with mind-blowing 3D graphics. Lounge around in the Cafeteria or take your leave and retire to the Library to take part into in the classics. But don't touch Dr. Trayton's most prized possession, his 7 original factory sealed copies of Scooby-Doo 2 : Monsters Unleased. Try to collect them if you dare but don't be surprised if his mood suddenly changes. There is one thing Dr. Trayton loves more than Scooby-Doo 2 : Monsters Unleashed, and that's his signature purple Kool-Aid. If you get caught in a chase don't be afraid to knock over his purple Kool-Aid to distract him.
summary: Peep the Trayton is an Indie Horror game that will knock your socks off with state of the art AI pathing. Collect 7 Movies that Trayton finds dear before he catches you.
